datoCmsKey.name: Macy Jae Davis
datoCmsKey.bio:
Hey y’all! 

I’m here, I’m queer, I’m not going anywheere! I’m a non-binary actor/Creator! I went to school for acting at Temple University. I graduated in 2018. I have been bouncing between the Philly and New York theater scenes! I have a great deal of experience in devising and in classical theater but I really just love new work so much. I am also Co-Founder of a Philadelphia based queer theater company by the name of Theater Oblivion! Check out our website at theateroblivion.com or our Instagram @theateroblivion  I’m excited to be a Key!!
